parameters.description: You sense the presence of living creatures with blood within 30 feet, even through walls (direction only, not exact location)
Each hit adds to a bleed counter. Roll 1d4 on normal hit, 1d8 with advantage, 2d4 on crit, or 2d8 on crit with advantage.
If you don't attack the tracked creature on your turn, the counter drops to 0. You can only track one creature at a time.
